name: Traffic Fast Motor 3D
description:
Traffic Fast Motor 3D is a fast paced motorcycle racing game with high-speed adrenaline-fueled driving you've never experienced before!
The best multiplayer traffic rider game!
Features:
- endless racing adventure on the road
- stunning 3D high quality graphics
- Exciting music and sound effects
- Real motorcycle performance and touch
- a variety of challenging tasks
- Adjustable steering wheel or button
